author: rickhall
msg: Modified the framework to always create a bundle context for a bundle
when it is started and to invalidate it when it is stopped.

author: rickhall
msg: Added bundle STARTING and STOPPING events (FELIX-34).

author: pyang
msg: Fix for HARMONY-972 ([classlib][nio]java.nio.channels.FileChannel.read(ByteBuffer,long) fails to read with a positioned bytebuffer correctly)

author: chinthaka
msg: Adding a parameter to give the user an option to override the addressing headers, if available by the time the message comes to the AddressingOutHandler.
